SEARCH
Module help
Package help.classes

Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
help.classes.ShoppingCart
public class ShoppingCart extends Object
Class representing a shopping cart that holds the products (movies and other items).

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ShoppingCart getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the ShoppingCart. If the instance is null, it creates a new instance of the ShoppingCart.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the ShoppingCart.

    • addSeats

      public void addSeats(List<String> seats)
      Adds a list of selected seats to the shopping cart. The provided seats are added to the existing list of selected seats.
      Parameters:
      seats - the list of seats to add to the shopping cart.

    • getSelectedSeats

      public List<String> getSelectedSeats()
      Returns a new list containing all selected seats. This method provides a copy of the selected seats.
      Returns:
      a list of selected seats.

    • getSelectedMovie

      public Movie getSelectedMovie()
      Returns the currently selected movie.
      Returns:
      the selected Movie object, or null if no movie is selected.

    • setSelectedMovie

      public void setSelectedMovie(Movie selectedMovie)
      Sets the selected movie. This method updates the selected movie in the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      selectedMovie - the Movie object to set as the selected movie.

    • getSelectedDaySessionAndHall

      public Session getSelectedDaySessionAndHall()
      Returns the selected session, day, and hall. If no session is selected, it prints a message and returns null.
      Returns:
      the selected Session object, or null if no session is selected.

    • setSelectedDaySessionAndHall

      public void setSelectedDaySessionAndHall(Session selectedDaySessionAndHall)
      Sets the selected session, day, and hall. This method updates the selected session in the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      selectedDaySessionAndHall - the Session object to set as the selected session.

    • addItemBought

      public void addItemBought(Product item, int quantity)
      Adds a product to the cart with the specified quantity. If the product already exists in the cart, it updates the quantity.
      Parameters:
      item - The product to add.
      quantity - The quantity of the product.

    • removeItemBought

      public void removeItemBought(Product item)
      Removes a product from the cart.
      Parameters:
      item - The product to remove.

    • getItemsBought

      public Map<Product,Integer> getItemsBought()
      Gets all items in the cart with their quantities.
      Returns:
      A map of products and their quantities.

    • clearSession

      public void clearSession()

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the selected seats, movie, day/session/hall, and items bought. This method resets all selections to their initial empty or null state.

    • clearSeats

      public void clearSeats()
      Clears the selected seats, removing all previously selected seats.

    • clearItemsBought

      public void clearItemsBought()
      Clears the items bought, removing all items from the purchase list.

    • clearSelectedMovie

      public void clearSelectedMovie()
      Clears the selected movie, setting it to null.
